content:
During the day, the Aviation of Defense Forces struck 6 areas of personnel, weapons and enemy military equipment.

About thisinformsThe General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

"Divisions of rocket troops have been defeated on 2 ammunition and one enemy's HPs," the message reads.

We will remind, the Armed Forces continuerestrain the enemy in Novopavlovsky and Avdiivskyi directions: 29 attacks are reflected.

As reported by the Armyinform, the Armed Forces soldiers in the south of UkraineDestroyedTwo Russian rebves.
title: Ukrainian aviation has inflicted 6 blows to the Russian Army
description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about it. “The missile troops were inflicted ...
author: Army Inform
